name: Warm And Crispy
description:
WAC is a prototype game of an "idea" that had its creator Federico Dueñas at the end of 2014, since then the game was made and undone many times due to change of technologies, setbacks or simple lack of motivation. It is not the dream game that was once thought, but it is the result of excellence (not excellent). The objective of making this video game after so many years is mostly an experiment and first learning step for future projects more focused on history than gameplay.
Thanks to my dear friend Matias Santucho for the realization of the vast majority of video game designs and for his support in waiting patiently for these long years haha

Greetings Federico
